sentences.en: Click OK to save your note as a web snippet.
sentences.cn: 按[确定]将你的笔记存到网路剪贴簿.

sentences.en: Explains how to assign a shortcut name to a snippet.
sentences.cn: 解释如何为代码段指定快捷方式名称.

sentences.en: For more information, see Code Snippet Picker.
sentences.cn: 有关更多信息, 请参见代码段选择器.

sentences.en: I read a snippet she had cut from a magazine.
sentences.cn: 我读了她从杂志上剪下来的一段文字。

sentences.en: I've got a snippet of information that might interest you.
sentences.cn: 我刚得到一点消息,是你可能感兴趣的.

sentences.en: In the Language: drop - down list, select the language that you want to add the code snippet.
sentences.cn: 在“语言: ”下拉列表中选择要添加代码段的语言.

sentences.en: In this topic, you will create a basic code snippet that displays a message box.
sentences.cn: 在本主题中, 您将创建显示消息框的基本代码段.

sentences.en: Parent element for all code snippet data.
sentences.cn: 所有代码段数据的父元素.

sentences.en: Right - click the mouse and then select the Insert Snippet command on the shortcut menu.
sentences.cn: 右击鼠标,然后选择快捷菜单上的“插入代码段”命令.

sentences.en: Select the existing folder that you want to place the imported code snippet into.
sentences.cn: 选择导入的代码段将要放入其中的现有文件夹.

sentences.en: The code snippet is now available for insertion into the code editor.
sentences.cn: 现在就可以将该代码段插入到代码编辑器中了.

sentences.en: The following code snippet illustrates how to express this properly.
sentences.cn: 下面的代码片段说明如何恰当的表达这些.

sentences.en: The following code snippet provides a scenario where an error occurs.
sentences.cn: 下面的代码段提供了发生错误的典型例子.

sentences.en: The procedure to display the Code Snippet Picker varies according to the language you are using.
sentences.cn: 显示“代码段选择器”的过程根据您所使用的语言会有所不同.

sentences.en: Type the shortcut for the code snippet that you want to add to code.
sentences.cn: 为要添加到代码中的代码段键入快捷方式.

words.tran_cn: 小片；片断；不知天高地厚的年轻人

trans.tran_cn: 小片，片段，不知天高地厚的年轻人
trans.tran_en: A snippet of something is a small piece of it
